verses.verse: ה֧וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe חֹֽשְׁבֵי־ <S%H2803><s%> to them that devise אָ֛וֶן <S%H205><s%> iniquity וּפֹ֥עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> and work רָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִשְׁכְּבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H4904><s%> upon their beds בְּא֤וֹר <S%H216><s%> is light הַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> when the morning יַעֲשׂ֔וּהָ <S%H6213><s%> they practise כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> it because it is לְאֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> in the power יָדָֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> of their hand

וְחָמְד֤וּ <S%H2530><s%> And they covet שָׂדוֹת֙ <S%H7704><s%> fields וְגָזָ֔לוּ <S%H1497><s%> and take [them] by violence וּבָתִּ֖ים <S%H1004><s%> and houses וְנָשָׂ֑אוּ <S%H5375><s%> and take [them] away וְעָֽשְׁקוּ֙ <S%H6231><s%> so they oppress גֶּ֣בֶר <S%H1397><s%> a man וּבֵית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> and his house וְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> even a man וְנַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5159><s%> and his heritage פ

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> behold חֹשֵׁ֛ב <S%H2803><s%> do I devise עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הַמִּשְׁפָּחָ֥ה <S%H4940><s%> Behold against this family הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> an evil אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot תָמִ֨ישׁוּ <S%H4185><s%> from which ye shall not remove מִשָּׁ֜ם <S%H8033><s%> in it צַוְּארֹֽתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H6677><s%> your necks וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> cannot תֵֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> walk רוֹמָ֔ה <S%H7317><s%> haughtily כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> for this time רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> [is] evil הִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> that

בַּיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> they יִשָּׂ֧א <S%H5375><s%> shall [one] take up עֲלֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> against מָשָׁ֗ל <S%H4912><s%> a parable וְנָהָ֨ה <S%H5091><s%> against you and lament נְהִ֤י <S%H5092><s%> lamentation נִֽהְיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> [and] say שָׁד֣וֹד <S%H7703><s%> We be utterly נְשַׁדֻּ֔נוּ <S%H7703><s%> spoiled חֵ֥לֶק <S%H2506><s%> the portion עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> of my people יָמִ֑יר <S%H4171><s%> he hath changed אֵ֚יךְ <S%H349><s%> How יָמִ֣ישׁ <S%H4185><s%> how hath he removed לִ֔י לְשׁוֹבֵ֥ב <S%H7728><s%> to the apostate שָׂדֵ֖ינוּ <S%H7704><s%> our fields יְחַלֵּֽק׃ <S%H2505><s%> he hath divided

לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will have לְךָ֔ מַשְׁלִ֥יךְ <S%H7993><s%> Therefore thou shalt have none that shall cast חֶ֖בֶל <S%H2256><s%> a cord בְּגוֹרָ֑ל <S%H1486><s%> by lot בִּקְהַ֖ל <S%H6951><s%> in the congregation יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּטִּ֖פוּ <S%H5197><s%> Prophesy יַטִּיפ֑וּן <S%H5197><s%> ye not [say they to them that] prophesy לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יַטִּ֣פוּ <S%H5197><s%> they shall not prophesy לָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִסַּ֖ג <S%H5253><s%> to them [that] they shall not take כְּלִמּֽוֹת׃ <S%H3639><s%> shame

הֶאָמ֣וּר <S%H559><s%> O [thou that art] named בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> the house יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob הֲקָצַר֙ <S%H7114><s%> straitened ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> is the spirit יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> another מַעֲלָלָ֑יו <S%H4611><s%> doing הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not דְבָרַ֨י <S%H1697><s%> act יֵיטִ֔יבוּ <S%H3190><s%> do good עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> with הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <S%H3477><s%> convenient הוֹלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> to him that walketh

וְאֶתְמ֗וּל <S%H865><s%> Even of late עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> my people לְאוֹיֵ֣ב <S%H341><s%> as an enemy יְקוֹמֵ֔ם <S%H6965><s%> is risen up מִמּ֣וּל <S%H4136><s%> with שַׂלְמָ֔ה <S%H8008><s%> the garment אֶ֖דֶר <S%H145><s%> the robe תַּפְשִׁט֑וּן <S%H6584><s%> ye pull off מֵעֹבְרִ֣ים <S%H5674><s%> from them that pass בֶּ֔טַח <S%H983><s%> by securely שׁוּבֵ֖י <S%H7725><s%> as men averse מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> from war

נְשֵׁ֤י <S%H802><s%> The women עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> of my people תְּגָ֣רְשׁ֔וּן <S%H1644><s%> have ye cast out מִבֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> houses תַּֽעֲנֻגֶ֑יהָ <S%H8588><s%> from their pleasant מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> From עֹֽלָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5768><s%> from their children תִּקְח֥וּ <S%H3947><s%> have ye taken away הֲדָרִ֖י <S%H1926><s%> my glory לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

ק֣וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> Arise וּלְכ֔וּ <S%H1980><s%> and go כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is no זֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הַמְּנוּחָ֑ה <S%H4496><s%> for this [is] not [your] rest בַּעֲב֥וּר <S%H5668><s%> Because טָמְאָ֛ה <S%H2930><s%> because it is polluted תְּחַבֵּ֖ל <S%H2254><s%> it shall destroy וְחֶ֥בֶל <S%H2256><s%> destruction נִמְרָֽץ׃ <S%H4834><s%> [you] even with a sore

לוּ־ <S%H3863><s%> If אִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man הֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walking ר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> in the spirit וָשֶׁ֣קֶר <S%H8267><s%> and falsehood כִּזֵּ֔ב <S%H3576><s%> do lie אַטִּ֣ף <S%H5197><s%> [saying] I will prophesy לְךָ֔ לַיַּ֖יִן <S%H3196><s%> unto thee of wine וְלַשֵּׁכָ֑ר <S%H7941><s%> and of strong drink וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become מַטִּ֖יף <S%H5197><s%> he shall even be the prophet הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> of this people הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

אָסֹ֨ף <S%H622><s%> I will surely אֶאֱסֹ֜ף <S%H622><s%> assemble יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> O Jacob כֻּלָּ֗ךְ <S%H3605><s%> all קַבֵּ֤ץ <S%H6908><s%> all of thee I will surely אֲקַבֵּץ֙ <S%H6908><s%> gather שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יַ֥חַד <S%H3162><s%> them together אֲשִׂימֶ֖נּוּ <S%H7760><s%> I will put כְּצֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> as the sheep בָּצְרָ֑ה <S%H1223><s%> the fold כְּעֵ֙דֶר֙ <S%H5739><s%> as the flock בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הַדָּֽבְר֔וֹ <S%H1699><s%> of their fold תְּהִימֶ֖נָה <S%H1949><s%> they shall make great noise מֵאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> by reason of [the multitude of] men

עָלָ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> is come up הַפֹּרֵץ֙ <S%H6555><s%> The breaker לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> before פָּֽרְצוּ֙ <S%H6555><s%> them they have broken up וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֔רוּ <S%H5674><s%> and have passed through שַׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> the gate וַיֵּ֣צְאוּ <S%H3318><s%> and are gone out ב֑וֹ וַיַּעֲבֹ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> shall pass מַלְכָּם֙ <S%H4428><s%> by it and their king לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> before וַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> them and the LORD בְּרֹאשָֽׁם׃ <S%H7218><s%> on the head פ
